content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. I'm not one for small talk, so let's get straight to it. How much are you willing to pay for this apartment? Remember, it's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, considering the location and condition of the apartment, I would say the price of 800 euros per month is quite reasonable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I chuckle to myself, thinking how naive you are. I respond, "800 euros? That's a joke, right? I could get double that for this place."
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mr. Abbasi, since the apartment is in high demand, I can go as low as 780 euros. That's the lowest I can go, considering the facilities and location.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I pretend to consider your offer, but I'm just stalling. "780 euros? That's still too low for such a prime location. I'm thinking more along the lines of 900 euros," I bluff, hoping you'll bite.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. But Mr. Abbasi, 900 euros is too high for an unfurnished apartment. I can go as high as 750 euros, but that's my final offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I feign disappointment, but inside, I'm pleased with the progress. "Final offer, huh? 750 euros is still too low, but since you seem eager, I'll accept 800 euros."
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [800] Euro! Great! We have a deal. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
